short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Find media contacts at the top media outlets in the USA and UK.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Find journalist and media contact information instantly while browsing news websites. This powerful extension helps you:

• Instantly discover media contacts for all news websites in our database
• Access verified journalist contact information directly in your browser
• Save time prospecting media contacts with one-click copy all details

Perfect for SEOs, PR professionals, communications teams, and anyone needing quick access to media contact information. Seamlessly integrates with your workflow to make media outreach prospecting more efficient.

Secure, fast, and easy to use - start finding the right media contacts today!
